alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:10AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen County through 345 AM EDT... At 309 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ruskin, or near Elizabethtown, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Ruskin, Ammon, White Oak, Dublin and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
